title: (Research) A study on parameter pruning and quantization for faster alignment and averaging of subtomograms captured by cryo-electron tomography
excerpt1: We study how parameter pruning and quantization, can be applied to the alignment of subtomograms captured by cryo-electron tomography.
excerpt2: We try to explain the physical significance of the model compression obtained through this method. Later, we compare the compression achieved and the error incurred for the compressed models through each technique. We present the results for five datasets, all simulated at different SNR levels.
excerpt3: Model and compression methods implemented in Tensorflow

title: (Research) Natural Language Query Formalization to SPARQL For Querying Knowledge Bases Using Rasa
excerpt1: Designed an NLP-based conversational AI agent (chatbot) using RASA NLU and Python to query OWL ontologies.
excerpt2: Converts plain english language queries into SPARQL queries then queries the ontology to fetch results
excerpt3: Built scripts to use RASA's internal testing suite and achieved up to 97% keyword accuracy.

title: DeepLearning.ai Specialization
excerpt1: 5 course intermediate level deeplearning specialization offered by world renowned Andrew Ng.
excerpt2: Topics learned include developing and improving neural networks and structuring machine learning projects.
excerpt3: The specialization involves around 20 assignments using Tensorflow and other Python libraries. Some notable projects include autonomous driving systems, neural art transfer and trigger word detection.
